author: Choo Han Teck J (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: G Krishnasamy Naidu v Public Prosecutor
coram: Choo Han Teck J; V K Rajah J; Tay Yong Kwang J
counsel: Peter Keith Fernando (Leo Fernando) and Jeeva Joethy (Joethy & Co) for the appellant; Lau Wing Yum and Jason Chan (Deputy Public Prosecutors) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Law/Special exceptions/Diminished responsibility/Whether appellant suffering from abnormality of mind/Whether such abnormality arising from condition of mind or illness/Whether mental responsibility of appellant sufficiently diminished by abnormality of mind/Whether limbs of inquiry under s 300 Exception 7 Penal Code to be considered separately or as whole/Section 300 Exception 7 Penal Code (Cap 224, 1985 Rev Ed)
